structure.unit: LEVEES, DRAINAGE, AND RECLAMATION OF LANDS

law.text: No person shall ride a horse or drive any vehicle on any public levee except at a crossing of a public road or at such private crossings as the board of levee commissioners has established.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 938a-10.
